general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering, and milking stages are critical stages. Cover the rows with dry leaves in sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to conserve water. Irrigate maize crop adequately. Mulch coconut leaves to reduce water loss. Cover vegetable seedlings with paper caps during the day. Harvest fingerlings in shallow ponds if water temperature rises. Various insect pests and diseases management advised for different crops.

advisory: Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering, and milking stages are critical. Avoid water scarcity during these stages.
High temperatures increase water requirement, irrigate adequately, and prevent water stagnation.
Protect from water scarcity by top-dressing with potassium.
Manage early shoot borer by frequent irrigation and manual egg mass destruction.
Apply Streptocyclin in water to prevent wilting.
Install pheromone traps and apply neem-based pesticide for pest management.
Mulch coconut leaves to reduce water loss.
Cover seedlings with paper caps during the day.
Check caterpillar migration and use appropriate insecticides.
Check caterpillar migration and use appropriate insecticides.
Dry harvested bulbs adequately for long-term storage.
Control mango hoppers with specific insecticides.
